ans: During COVID-19 waves were observed lots of people lost their lives due to poor health care system.
Serving Human is Serving God.so to provide best possible health care (Medical, Surgical and Maternity) services with medicines and meals totally free of cost to all, irrespective of caste & creed.
Many people have benefited from out patient and inpatient surgical and medical care since opening of Hospital. Please visit our performance page for detail.
Of course funds are most important to run such a successfull health infrastructure for free and we are thankful to our petrons. Please visit our Petrons page for detail.
